TargetDirection.description: Coordinates to face toward when entering the volume?

Template.description: A debug shortcut used to quickly set CurveCorrectionForce and PathCorrectionForce: 0: Wall-running 1: Custom 2: Normal 3: Dash Mode

m_IsLimitEdge.description: Prevents the player from running past the end of the path.

m_IsReverseCameraEnable.description: Change the camera when entering from opposite side?

m_PathCorrectionForce.description: How aggressively the player should be moved on to the path.
